messages.subject: NY STATE and reports
messages.msgSnippet: im an unschooler...i just keep a journal of our life and it turns into a paragraph for each subject quarterly which is what we are required....we havent tested
messages.messageBody:
im an unschooler...i just keep a journal of our life and it turns into a
paragraph for each subject quarterly which is what we are required....we
havent tested yet. that i s where I will be as creative as possible ~ perhaps
Seton which costs $20~ but minimal pre-requisite learning. 5th grade is the
first we have to t est. and they only have to pass 33% to be legal. IM HOPING
FOR A LOT MORE THAN THAT! Denise
